markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [I don't have accepted IDs for GCash verification. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45574039056153-I-don-t-have-accepted-IDs-for-GCash-verification-What-do-I-do)
- [I’m having issues with using my ePhil ID (Paper type) or Digital National ID to verify my GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45378359816089-I-m-having-issues-with-using-my-ePhil-ID-Paper-type-or-Digital-National-ID-to-verify-my-GCash-account)
- [Ano ang mga steps para makakuha ng Fully Verified na GCash Account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42822120412825-Ano-ang-mga-steps-para-makakuha-ng-Fully-Verified-na-GCash-Account)
- [How can I submit additional documents for my GCash Jr. verification?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42598618757913-How-can-I-submit-additional-documents-for-my-GCash-Jr-verification)
- [Hindi pa verified ang GCash account ko pagkatapos ng 3 araw. Ano ang gagawin ko?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42822435136665-Hindi-pa-verified-ang-GCash-account-ko-pagkatapos-ng-3-araw-Ano-ang-gagawin-ko)
- [My GCash account is still not verified after 3 days. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30299089512601-My-GCash-account-is-still-not-verified-after-3-days-What-do-I-do)
- [My GCash account verification failed. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006458483-My-GCash-account-verification-failed-What-should-I-do)
- [Why did I receive a notification to update my GCash account information?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35141220806169-Why-did-I-receive-a-notification-to-update-my-GCash-account-information)

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657894-Verify-Your-Account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you're stuck on the page below and have already completed the ID Scan, Selfie Scan, and form for your GCash Jr. Verification, you may have to submit additional documents.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/42598618754841)

Please make sure your parent is a [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31782046693529-I-was-Fully-Verified-why-was-my-GCash-account-downgraded-to-a-basic-account) GCash user and provide the following documents:

- Photo or Original Copy of your Birth Certificate (Philippine Statistics Authority/National Statistics Office/ Certified True Copy)

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/42603276515353)

- A selfie with your parent holding your ID

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/42603305981465)

To proceed with your GCash Jr. verification and submit additional documents, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=account_verification__i_have_an_existing_application__my_verification_is_still_in_upgrade_in_progress). A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours**.

If you've submitted additional documents for GCash Jr. verification but are still stuck in the "We're verifying your account" page, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=account_verification__i_have_an_existing_application__my_verification_is_still_in_upgrade_in_progress). A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours**.

[Previous](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42822120412825-Ano-ang-mga-steps-para-makakuha-ng-Fully-Verified-na-GCash-Account)

Ano ang mga steps para makakuha ng Fully Verified na GCash Account?

[Next](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42822435136665-Hindi-pa-verified-ang-GCash-account-ko-pagkatapos-ng-3-araw-Ano-ang-gagawin-ko)

Hindi pa verified ang GCash account ko pagkatapos ng 3 araw. Ano ang gagawin ko?
